alert.note: Alert for Municipality of Skagway (Alaska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued January 26 at 7:25PM AKST until January 27 at 9:00PM AKST by NWS Juneau
info.description: .Reports of light freezing rain and 1 to 3 inches of snow along the Chilkat Peninsula south of Haines Friday afternoon and evening. Freezing rain potential will continue through late tonight as warm air edge northward. ...WINTER STORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 9 PM AKST SATURDAY... * WHAT...Heavy wet snow expected. Light freezing rain at lower elevations possible late Friday night. Total snow accumulations of up to 13 inches. Winds gusting as high as 45 mph Friday night. * WHERE...Klondike Highway above 1000 Feet. * WHEN...Until 9 PM AKST Saturday. * IMPACTS...Travel will be very difficult. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Skagway is expected to change over to rain late Friday night with a brief period of freezing rain possible as it transitions. Snow levels expected to rise up to 2000 feet by Saturday afternoon.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water with you in case of an emergency. For the latest road conditions, where available, call 5 1 1 or visit 511.alaska.gov.
